alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 10:43AM EST until March 20 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Recent rain and snow will lead to a secondary rise along the Wabash River at New Harmony through the weekend and into early next week. River levels are forecast to crest in the minor flooding range next week, then fall below flood stage next weekend. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY, MARCH 20... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Sunday, March 20. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, March 20. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
